title: Blue Essence Lost After Upgrading Champion and Didn't Get Champion?
body:
Hello there!
This is my first post so here we go:

Today I had purchased Kindred (from a champion shard) and lost 3780 blue essence? The game had told me to restart my game after "upgrading" the champion shard because a connection problem and now I am left with 1726 blue essence and no Kindred champion. Just a champion shard. Do you guys know how should I approach this problem?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Since it's an account specific issue and also purchase related you'll have to go through player support for that one. Just follow the prompts and submit. They're usually pretty quick on their replies but given the time of year you might have to wait a little while. Just don't create a new ticket or reply until you actually get a response, cause it'll bump you back o the bottom of the queue.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
